markdownRemark.html:
• Intro to Dave Wascha’s
  • 20 Years of Product Management in 25 Minutes
  • What advice he would give to his younger self (applicable to anyone just starting off)
  • Encapsulates his 20 years of successes and failures
  • Here is a list of his learnings from this talk
  • Please do watch the video - it’s a wonderful investment of time

Listen to Customers

frontmatter.title: 20 Years of Product Management in 25 Minutes
